content: Started working on a new project, can't say much about it, but it's going to be big!
Came up with a new theorem, I haven't proven it yet but it's probably correct.
So close to making a rigorous axiomatic system, I can feel it. This is going to revolutionize the way we think about mathematics.
Throwback! Here's a picture of me with when I wrote my first set theory article. Have learned so much since then.
Found a little bug inside my computer lmao, I thought there was a mistake in the code. I'm so silly sometimes.
I love speaking Ancient Greek and dividing eight-digit numbers in my head. Favourite pass-time.
Triangles are so cool. I hope I don't get chased into a field of beans any time soon. Man I love triangles.
WE ARE ANONYMOUS. WE DO NOT FORGIVE. WE DO NOT FORGET. WE ARE ANONYMOUS.
